function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"In-person interactions during interviews and onboarding process","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct virtual interviews, implement social distancing parameters, screen for symptoms of COVID-19, and restrict movements of symptomatic individuals","Technologies":"Virtual meeting software, symptom screening tools","People":"Job applicants, HR professionals","Owner":"Human Resources"},{"Description":"Lack of screening for vendors and visitors","Impact":"Increased risk of introducing contagious diseases, including COVID-19, to the facility","Mitigation":"Implement uniform screening procedures for vendors and visitors, communicate COVID-19 management policy to vendors and visitors, adhere to health authority guidance","Technologies":"Screening tools, communication tools","People":"Management, vendors, visitors","Owner":"Facility Management"},{"Description":"Lack of familiarity with company policies and relevant legislation","Impact":"Failure to implement necessary guidelines for mitigating the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure all managers and staff are familiar with company policies, relevant legislation, and employment act","Technologies":"Training materials, communication tools","People":"Managers, staff","Owner":"Human Resources"}]}
